护理措施；护理干预；护理干预措施
护理团队；护理队伍；成组护理

护理站；护士工作站；护士站
护理助理；护理助手；看护助理

bilingual.source: She is studying nursing at the university.
The hospital has a great nursing staff.
bilingual.target: 这家医院有一支优秀的护理团队。

bilingual.source: He chose a career in nursing to help others.
bilingual.target: 他选择了护理职业来帮助别人。

bilingual.source: Nursing requires a lot of patience and compassion.
bilingual.target: 护理需要很多耐心和同情心。

bilingual.source: She decided to study nursing at a training college.
bilingual.target: 她决定去职业学院学习护理。

bilingual.source: She has been nursing her sick mother for weeks.
bilingual.target: 她已经护理生病的母亲好几个星期了。

bilingual.source: She is studying nursing at a higher vocational education school.
bilingual.target: 她在高职学校学习护理专业。

bilingual.source: The head of the nursing department held an important meeting.
bilingual.target: 护理部主任召开了一个重要的会议。

bilingual.source: The hospital matron is responsible for overseeing the nursing staff.
bilingual.target: 医院的年长的妇女负责监督护理人员。

yingyinNormal.en: I had a dream the other night that I was in a cave and I was nursing a baby, but the baby had Sheldon's head on it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 某晚我做了一个梦，梦见我在一个山洞里哺育一个婴儿，但这个婴儿长着谢尔顿的脑袋。

yingyinNormal.en: So my guy turned out to be more insane than Elaine. Toby? Get this. So he takes me to a nursing home, to sing in front of old people. So I'd be a star but in a comfortable environment, 'cause otherwise I would freak out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我发现我交往的对象比伊莱恩还疯狂。托比？听我说，他把我带去一家养老院……让我在一群老人前唱歌。好让我在避免尴尬的情况下当一回明星，要不然我肯定会崩溃。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 护理职业；护理工作

word_family.mean: n. 护士；护理员；沙锥齿鲨；保育员；乳母；保姆；奶妈；防护树

examination_example.sentence: At Boston College, for example, you would have to complete an extra year were you to switch to the <highlight>nursing</highlight> school from another department.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如在波士顿大学，如果你要从其他系转到护理学院，你必须额外完成一年学业。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 护理职业；护理工作

word_family.mean: n. 护士；护理员；沙锥齿鲨；保育员；乳母；保姆；奶妈；防护树

examination_example.sentence: Visits to <highlight>nursing</highlight> homes and schools are also a regular part of the horses' schedule.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参观养老院和学校也是马匹日程的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: If you can't get to the <highlight>nursing</highlight> home to visit grandma, you can use a telepresence robot to hang out with her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不能去养老院看望奶奶，你可以用远程机器人来陪她。

examination_example.sentence: Conversations about the benefits of fiber are probably more common in <highlight>nursing</highlight> homes than high schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于纤维益处的讨论在养老院可能比在高中更常见。

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 护理职业；护理工作

word_family.mean: n. 护士；护理员；沙锥齿鲨；保育员；乳母；保姆；奶妈；防护树

examination_example.sentence: A friend recently took her mother to visit an expensive assisted living/<highlight>nursing</highlight> home near my town.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位朋友最近带她妈妈去了我镇附近一家昂贵的养老院。

examination_example.sentence: About 75% of elderly parents who don't go to <highlight>nursing</highlight> homes live within 30 minutes of at least one of their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在不去疗养院的老年父母中，约75%的人至少能在30分钟内与其中一个孩子住在一起。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Nursing</highlight> homes and smaller residential care homes (known in some states as board and care homes or adult care homes) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 养老院和较小的寄宿护理院(在一些州被称为寄宿和照护之家或成人护理院)。

sense_info_list.en: A nursing mother is a woman who is feeding her baby with her own breast milk.

examination_example.sentence: Officials describe the baby elephant as "healthy, standing and <highlight>nursing</highlight>".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员们形容这只小象“健康、站立、吃奶”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 护理职业；护理工作

word_family.mean: n. 护士；护理员；沙锥齿鲨；保育员；乳母；保姆；奶妈；防护树

examination_example.sentence: As she was leaving, she was <highlight>eager</highlight> to say goodbye to each of us in the nursing team.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当她要离开的时候，她渴望和护理团队的每一个人道别。

examination_example.sentence: She was <highlight>grateful</highlight> for everything that the medical and nursing team had done for her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她感谢医疗和护理团队为她所做的一切。

examination_example.sentence: I heard that the seniors in the <highlight>nursing</highlight> home couldn't see their families and friends very often.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我听说养老院的老人不能经常见到家人和朋友。

examination_example.sentence: These includes jobs in fields like teaching, <highlight>nursing</highlight> and personal training.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这其中包括教学、护理和个人培训等领域的工作。
